classes.name: VCODeploymentStatus
classes.description: Provides information about the progress status of a deployment action.

methods.name: getMessages
methods.description: Retrieves any additional information about the status of the deployment.

methods.name: getTargetName
methods.description: Retrieves the target machine name for the deployment.

methods.name: getStatusAsString
methods.description: Retrieves the status with possible values SUCCESSFULL or FAILED>.

methods.name: getElementName
methods.description: Retrieves the element name for the event.

classes.name: VCOHostValidator
classes.description: Provides functionality for validating hosts and retrieving certification info.

methods.name: getCertificateInfo
methods.description: Retrieves the server's certificate info as a string.

methods.name: installCertificates
methods.description: Install the server's certificate into the JSSE keystore (only the server's specific certificate, not the whole chain).

classes.name: VCORemoteAction
classes.description: Object representing an instance of remote objects of type Action.

classes.name: VCORemoteActionCategory
classes.description: Object representing an instance of remote objects of type ActionCategory.

classes.name: VCORemoteActionsFolder
classes.description: Object representing the root folder containing remote objects of type Action.

classes.name: VCORemoteAny
classes.description: Object representing an instance of remote objects of type Any.

classes.name: VCORemoteConfigurationElement
classes.description: Object representing an instance of remote objects of type ConfigurationElementCategory.

classes.name: VCORemoteConfigurationElementCategory
classes.description: Object representing an instance of remote objects of type ConfigurationElementCategory.

classes.name: VCORemoteConfigurationsFolder
classes.description: Object representing the root folder for the remote objects of type Configuration.

classes.name: VCORemotePackage
classes.description: Object representing an instance of remote objects of type Package.

classes.name: VCORemotePackagesFolder
classes.description: Object representing the root folder for the remote objects of type Package.

classes.name: VCORemoteResourceElement
classes.description: Object representing an instance of remote objects of type ResourceElement.

classes.name: VCORemoteResourceElementCategory
classes.description: Object representing an instance of remote objects of type ResourceElementCategory.

classes.name: VCORemoteResourcesFolder
classes.description: Object representing the root folder for the remote objects of type Resource.

classes.name: VCORemoteServer
classes.description: Object representing the connection info for remote vCenter Orchestrator server.

methods.name: findAllPackages
methods.description: Retrieves a list of available remote packages.

methods.name: findAllWorkflows
methods.description: Retrieves a list of available remote workflows.

classes.name: VCORemoteSystem
classes.description: Object representing the root folder for the remote system objects.

classes.name: VCORemoteTask
classes.description: Object representing an instance of remote objects of type Task.

classes.name: VCORemoteWorkflow
classes.description: Object representing an instance of remote objects of type Workflow.

methods.name: deleteCompletedWorkflowTokens
methods.description: Deletes the completed workflow tokens.

classes.name: VCORemoteWorkflowCategory
classes.description: Object representing an instance of remote objects of type WorkflowCategory.

classes.name: VCORemoteWorkflowToken
classes.description: Object representing an instance of a remote workflow, either running or finished.

methods.name: getInputParameters
methods.description: Retrieves the input parameters of the target workflow after completion.

methods.name: getOutputParameters
methods.description: Retrieves the output parameters of the target workflow after completion.

methods.name: getException
methods.description: Retrieves the exception raised while running the target workflow after the workflow has completed.

methods.name: getAttributes
methods.description: Retrieves the attributes of the target workflow after completion.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Requests a cancellation of the token.

classes.name: VCORemoteWorkflowsFolder
classes.description: Object representing the root folder for the remote workflows.

classes.name: VCOServerConfiguration
classes.description: A configuration data object class for the Orchestrator server objects.

classes.name: VCODeploymentManager
classes.description: Provides the core set of functions for deploying and deleting vCenter Orchestrator packages and workflows.

methods.name: deletePackageWithContent
methods.description: Deletes a package on a remote Orchestrator server.

methods.name: deletePackageWithContentByName
methods.parameters: server: VCORemoteServer, name: string, keepShared: boolean
methods.description: Deletes a package on a remote Orchestrator server by package name.

methods.name: deployWorkflow
methods.parameters: server: VCORemoteServer, source: any, path: string, override: boolean
methods.description: Deploys a specified workflow on target servers. The workflow information is exported from the local Orchestrator server.

methods.name: deployRemoteWorkflow
methods.parameters: server: VCORemoteServer, source: VCORemoteWorkflow, path: string, override: boolean
methods.description: Deploys a specified workflow on target servers. The workflow information is exported from a remote Orchestrator server.

methods.name: deployPackage
methods.parameters: pkg: any, servers: VCORemoteServer[], override: boolean
methods.description: Deploy specified package on list of target servers.Package information is exported from local server.

methods.name: deployRemotePackage
methods.parameters: pkg: VCORemotePackage, targets: VCORemoteServer[], override: boolean
methods.description: Deploys a specified package on s list of target servers. The package information is exported from the provided remote package.

methods.name: deleteWorkflow
methods.description: Deletes a workflow on a remote server.

classes.name: VCOPlugin
classes.description: Provides the core set of functions for accessing information about configured remote servers.

methods.name: getAvailableRemoteServers
methods.description: Retrieves a list of accessible remote servers.

methods.name: findRemoteServersByHost
methods.description: Retrieves a remote server by host.

methods.name: findRemoteServerByName
methods.description: Retrieves a remote server by name.

methods.name: getRemoteServers
methods.description: Retrieves a list of configured remote servers.

classes.name: VCOProxyWorkflowManager
classes.description: Manages the creation and execution of the proxies for the remote workflows.

methods.name: createProxy
methods.description: Creates a workflow to make calls to a remote workflow.

methods.name: createAllProxies
methods.description: Creates a workflow to make calls to a remote workflow for all workflows available on remote server.

methods.name: createProxies
methods.parameters: remotePathId: string, recursive: boolean, synchronos: boolean
methods.description: Creates a workflow to make calls to a remote workflow for all workflows under a specified remote folder.

methods.name: createProxyActionForRemote
methods.parameters: actionName: string, moduleName: string, workflow: VCORemoteWorkflow
methods.description: Generates a proxy action for a running remote workflow.

methods.name: createProxyActionForLocal
methods.parameters: actionName: string, moduleName: string, workflow: any
methods.description: Generates a proxy action for a running remote workflow based on the local workflow definition.

methods.name: processStaleProxyWorkflowExecutions
methods.description: Process the workflow runs in waiting-state to reflect the remote workflow state.

methods.name: executeAsynchronousProxy
methods.parameters: connectionId: string, workflowId: string, parameters: any
methods.description: Starts an asynchronous run of the remote workflow. Validates that the remote workflow and the parameters are from the same remote Orchestrator server, and ensures that the arguments are of the correct type.

methods.name: executeSynchronousProxy
methods.parameters: connectionId: string, workflowId: string, parameters: any
methods.description: Used for running a synchronous workflow proxies.Starts a synchronous run of the remote workflow. Validates that the remote workflow and the parameters are from the same remote Orchestrator server, and ensures that the arguments are of the correct type.

methods.name: executeAsynchronousProxies
methods.description: Used for running an asynchronous workflow proxies. Starts an asynchronous run of the remote workflow. Validates that the remote workflow and the parameters are from the same remote Orchestrator server, and ensures that the arguments are of the correct type.

methods.name: deleteProxies
methods.description: Deletes the proxy workflows generated for a remote server.

classes.name: VCOServerManager
classes.description: Provides the core set of functions for adding,updating, and deleting remote Orchestrator servers.

methods.name: addOrchestrator
methods.description: Adds a remote Orchestrator server.

methods.name: updateOrchestrator
methods.description: Updates a remote Orchestrator server.

methods.name: updateServer
methods.parameters: src: VCORemoteServer, host: string, port: number, isShared: boolean, user: string, password: string, connectionTimeout: number, socketTimeout: number, retryTimeout: number, ssoEnabled: boolean, ssoScheme: string, ssoHost: string, ssoPort: number, ssoSameAsVco: boolean
methods.description: Updates a remote Orchestrator server.

methods.name: deleteOrchestrator
methods.description: Deletes a remote Orchestrator server.

methods.name: deleteServer
methods.description: Deletes a remote Orchestrator server.

methods.name: addServer
methods.parameters: host: string, port: number, isShared: boolean, user: string, password: string, connectionTimeout: number, socketTimeout: number, retryTimeout: number, ssoEnabled: boolean, ssoScheme: string, ssoHost: string, ssoPort: number, ssoSameAsVco: boolean
methods.description: Adds a remote Orchestrator server.
